name: Previous Client
feedback: The Java developer built a robust backend system for our platform. Code was clean, well-documented, and the API design was solid. Good communication throughout.

name: Tech Lead
feedback: Worked together on multiple enterprise projects. Strong understanding of Java Spring Boot and microservices. Always delivered clean, maintainable code with proper tests.

name: Open Source Maintainer
feedback: Reviewed their React component contributions. Code follows best practices, good TypeScript usage, and clean architecture. Would collaborate again.
